underlying_goal: Incorporate a new 'consistency rubric' for adversarial prompts into a research paper and update the agent's own writing style.
primary_success: Successfully synthesizing a complex user request to both edit a paper with a new rubric and modify the agent's own writing style, executing both tasks correctly.
brief_summary: The user provided a new 'consistency rubric' and asked the agent to add it to their paper. The agent proposed a plan and added the rubric to the appendix and limitations section. The user then asked the agent to update its own writing style to be less 'LLM-ish', which the agent did by modifying its configuration files, while also providing helpful context to the user about why this is necessary.
